mapper.select: select count(*) AS count from board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD SELECT LEVEL board_no, '제목'||LEVEL title, '내용'||LEVEL contents, '397839829850900'||LEVEL||'.png' image, Level AS viewCnt, sysdate - LEVEL reg_dt, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'james','admin') reg_id, sysdate - LEVEL mod_dt, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'james','admin') mod_id FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <=502
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, contents, image, view_cnt, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as modDt, mod_id FROM board where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_cnt = view_cnt+1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, image = #{image}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, mod_id = #{modId} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
